    • Illness and Disability Data

    This section includes the core datasets around population, illness and disability, for West Sussex.

    The population data section comprises annual population estimates, projections, life expectancy and other mortality data are collected for the various geographies and populations in West Sussex. Deprivation data from the 2015 Indices of deprivation and other poverty data are also provided as are West Sussex relevant data tables from the 2011 census. Finally, information on the protected characteristics from the 2010 Equality Act are given.

    There are also a set of maps, for many of the geographies that are used in producing health and social care statistics for West Sussex.

    A set of tools developed by the Research Unit are also provided in this section for users to carry out similar analyses.

    Finally, an index of key illness and disability data is available here.

    Please note: we are currently updating the West Sussex JSNA site so please check back soon for updates.
